briefTitle: Rapid Evaluation of Innovative Intervention Components to Maximize the Health Benefits of Behavioral Obesity Treatment Delivered Online: An Application of Multiphase Optimization Strategy
officialTitle: Rapid Evaluation of Innovative Intervention Components to Maximize the Health Benefits of Behavioral Obesity Treatment Delivered Online: An Application of Multiphase Optimization Strategy

interventions.name: Virtual Reality for Behavioral Weight Loss Skills Training
Tailored Intervention for Structured Physical Activity
Platform for Social Support & Friendly Competition

arms.label: Social Support, Dysregulated Eating, Exercise, Feedback

summary: When delivered online, behavioral obesity treatments have the potential to reach large numbers of individuals with overweight/obesity and produce significant improvements in health and wellbeing. In order to maximize the public health benefit of disseminating these treatments online, this study will use the Multiphase Optimization Strategy (MOST) framework to most quickly and efficiently determine which, if any, of 5 innovative intervention components, alone or in combination, increases the proportion of patients achieving a â‰¥5% weight loss, and mean weight loss, after a 12-month online behavioral obesity treatment.

primaryOutcome.measure: Weight Change (Percent of Initial Body Weight) From Baseline to Month 12, Main Effect of Time
